jediranger:AlarmClock.NAME: Alarm Clock
jediranger:AlarmClock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put an jediranger:Empowerable card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile and jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! it.

jediranger:ArcaneSeer.NAME: Arcane Seer
jediranger:ArcaneSeer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This turn, whenever you play a card with no Block or damage, jediranger:Empower !M! the top card of your draw pile.

jediranger:ArrowStab.NAME: Arrow Stab
jediranger:ArrowStab.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card to NL deal !D! damage.

jediranger:AshBarrier.NAME: Ash Barrier
jediranger:AshBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 [E] if you've Exhausted a card this turn.

jediranger:BalancedArrow.NAME: Balanced Arrow
jediranger:BalancedArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust if jediranger:Empowered.

jediranger:ChillingGrasp.NAME: Chilling Grasp
jediranger:ChillingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL Enemy loses Strength this turn equal to HP drained. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:CrimsonApotheosis.NAME: Crimson Apotheosis
jediranger:CrimsonApotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! ALL cards. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:CrimsonArmor.NAME: Crimson Armor
jediranger:CrimsonArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Temporary_HP X times. NL Affected by Block modifiers.

jediranger:CrimsonBreath.NAME: Crimson Breath
jediranger:CrimsonBreath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to each enemy that intends to attack and !M! Vulnerable to others.

jediranger:CrimsonChaos.NAME: Crimson Chaos
jediranger:CrimsonChaos.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. NL For each *Crimson *Chaos played this combat, shuffle a random card of any color into your draw pile. ( !M! ) NL Exhaust

jediranger:CrimsonDemon.NAME: Crimson Demon
jediranger:CrimsonDemon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

jediranger:CrimsonDiscovery.NAME: Crimson Discovery
jediranger:CrimsonDiscovery.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Choose 1 of 3 Attacks to jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! and add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jediranger:CrimsonDiscovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Choose 1 of 3 Attacks to jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! and add to your hand.

jediranger:CrimsonForm.NAME: Crimson Form
jediranger:CrimsonForm.DESCRIPTION: If you don't have enough [E] to play a card, you may spend 3 HP for each [E] missing.

jediranger:CrimsonHammer.NAME: Crimson Hammer
jediranger:CrimsonHammer.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Upgrade a card in hand until the end of this run. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:CrimsonHarvest.NAME: Crimson Harvest
jediranger:CrimsonHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, heal !M! HP.
jediranger:CrimsonHarvest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, heal !M! HP.

jediranger:CrimsonOffering.NAME: Crimson Offering
jediranger:CrimsonOffering.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! that many cards on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:CrimsonPrinter.NAME: Crimson Printer
jediranger:CrimsonPrinter.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a copy of the first card you play each turn into your draw pile.

jediranger:CrimsonReality.NAME: Crimson Reality
jediranger:CrimsonReality.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, lose HP equal to its cost and Upgrade it.

jediranger:CrimsonRune.NAME: Crimson Rune
jediranger:CrimsonRune.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.
jediranger:CrimsonRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you lose HP during your turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

jediranger:CrimsonSplitter.NAME: Crimson Splitter
jediranger:CrimsonSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! copies of a card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: shuffle %d copies into your draw pile.

jediranger:Empower.NAME: Empower
jediranger:Empower.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! all cards in your hand.

jediranger:EndlessArrow.NAME: Endless Arrow
jediranger:EndlessArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:ExtraCopy.NAME: Extra Copy
jediranger:ExtraCopy.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn a card is created during combat, shuffle !M! additional copy of it into your draw pile.

jediranger:FadingMemories.NAME: Fading Memories
jediranger:FadingMemories.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card played this turn. NL Add an jediranger:Ephemeral copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
jediranger:FadingMemories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card played this turn. NL Add an jediranger:Ephemeral copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select a card you played this turn to add to your hand

jediranger:FlashOfInspiration.NAME: Flash of Inspiration
jediranger:FlashOfInspiration.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Refill your [E]. NL Exhaust.
jediranger:FlashOfInspiration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Refill your [E]. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:FocusingShard.NAME: Focusing Shard
jediranger:FocusingShard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you jediranger:Empower a card, jediranger:Empower it by !M! more.
jediranger:FocusingShard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you jediranger:Empower a card, jediranger:Empower it by !M! more.

jediranger:FreshOfferings.NAME: Fresh Offerings
jediranger:FreshOfferings.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] NL for each card Exhausted this turn. NL Add a *Crimson *Demon to your hand. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:GashingArrow.NAME: Gashing Arrow
jediranger:GashingArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each *Gashing *Arrow played this combat.

jediranger:GlassSword.NAME: Glass Sword
jediranger:GlassSword.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Brittle !jediranger:BRT! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this card is at maximum jediranger:Empower, double its base damage.

jediranger:HailOfArrows.NAME: Hail of Arrows
jediranger:HailOfArrows.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

jediranger:Hearthguard.NAME: Hearthguard
jediranger:Hearthguard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, jediranger:Empower !M! all cards in your hand and lose !M! HP for each card jediranger:Empowered.
jediranger:Hearthguard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, jediranger:Empower !M! all cards in your hand and lose !M! HP for each card jediranger:Empowered.

jediranger:HeavyArrow.NAME: Heavy Arrow
jediranger:HeavyArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! all cards in your hand.

jediranger:Illuminate.NAME: Illuminate
jediranger:Illuminate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! a card in hand.

jediranger:InfinityStrike.NAME: Infinity Strike
jediranger:InfinityStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, permanently increase the damage of ALL *Infinity *Strikes by the number of *Infinity *Strikes. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:InstantFlashback.NAME: Instant Flashback
jediranger:InstantFlashback.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain benefit based on last card played this turn.
jediranger:InstantFlashback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain better benefit based on last card played this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

jediranger:KissOfDeath.NAME: Kiss of Death
jediranger:KissOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:LastGlory.NAME: Last Glory
jediranger:LastGlory.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! the !M! top cards of your draw pile.

jediranger:MakeshiftArmor.NAME: Makeshift Armor
jediranger:MakeshiftArmor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain !M! Block.

jediranger:MakeshiftSword.NAME: Makeshift Sword
jediranger:MakeshiftSword.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

jediranger:Mobilize.NAME: Mobilize
jediranger:Mobilize.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by !M! [E] this turn. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:ObliviousCloak.NAME: Oblivious Cloak
jediranger:ObliviousCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1 [E] and make it jediranger:Ephemeral.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: reduce cost by 1 and make Ephemeral.

jediranger:OneShot.NAME: One Shot
jediranger:OneShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each *Arrow played this combat.

jediranger:Overcharge.NAME: Overcharge
jediranger:Overcharge.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! a card in hand and make it jediranger:Ephemeral. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:PainfulMemories.NAME: Painful Memories
jediranger:PainfulMemories.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Apply Vulnerable equal to its cost.

jediranger:PaleSlash.NAME: Pale Slash
jediranger:PaleSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Hemophilia on top of your draw pile.

jediranger:PerfectSetup.NAME: Perfect Setup
jediranger:PerfectSetup.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

jediranger:PerfectedArrow.NAME: Perfected Arrow
jediranger:PerfectedArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Arrow".

jediranger:PhoenixTears.NAME: Phoenix Tears
jediranger:PhoenixTears.DESCRIPTION: Remove jediranger:Empower from ALL cards and heal that much HP. NL Fleeting.

jediranger:PowerBarrier.NAME: Power Barrier
jediranger:PowerBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever this card is jediranger:Empowered, gain !M! Block.

jediranger:ProgressDay.NAME: Progress Day
jediranger:ProgressDay.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Reduce their cost by 1 this turn.

jediranger:Rally.NAME: Rally
jediranger:Rally.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the top card of your draw pile is a Skill, jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! all cards in your hand.

jediranger:RaiderSpear.NAME: Raider Spear
jediranger:RaiderSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If the top card of your draw pile is an Attack, jediranger:Drain !D! ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:Remembrance.NAME: Remembrance
jediranger:Remembrance.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each card Exhausted this turn. NL Choose 1 of !M! rare cards from any character to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jediranger:Remembrance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each card Exhausted this turn. NL Choose 1 of !M! rare cards from any character to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:RivershaperStrike.NAME: Rivershaper Strike
jediranger:RivershaperStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fetch a card with no Block and damage from your draw pile.

jediranger:RoughenFeathers.NAME: Roughen Feathers
jediranger:RoughenFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

jediranger:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
jediranger:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Fetch !M! cards from your discard pile.

jediranger:SignalArrow.NAME: Signal Arrow
jediranger:SignalArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL When Exhausted, draw !M! card.
jediranger:SignalArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL When Exhausted, draw !M! cards.

jediranger:SiphonPower.NAME: Siphon Power
jediranger:SiphonPower.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card to NL gain [E] equal to its jediranger:Empower.

jediranger:SoulSplitter.NAME: Soul Splitter
jediranger:SoulSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Choose a non-Power card. Add an jediranger:Ephemeral copy of it to your hand. It costs 1 [E] less this turn.

jediranger:SpinningAxe.NAME: Spinning Axe
jediranger:SpinningAxe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, draw a card and shuffle this card back to your draw pile.

jediranger:Transfusion.NAME: Transfusion
jediranger:Transfusion.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Empower -1 a card in hand. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! the !M! cards of your draw pile.

jediranger:TwinDisciplines.NAME: Twin Disciplines
jediranger:TwinDisciplines.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL Gain Temporary_HP equal to HP drained. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:Undying.NAME: Undying
jediranger:Undying.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Exhausted, increase its damage by !M! and Fetch it back to your hand.

jediranger:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
jediranger:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL At the end of your next turn, take damage equal to HP drained. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:VileFeast.NAME: Vile Feast
jediranger:VileFeast.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL Create a *Withering *Strike in hand with damage equal to twice the HP drained. NL Exhaust.
